QueryDefinition.Query: select ch.person_id as PersonId, coalesce(m.collect_date, m.result_date) as collect_date, m.collect_time, m.encid, m.specimen_source, m.organism, ch.PartitionId from {sc}.microbiology m JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND m.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by ch.PartitionId, ch.person_id
